playwright.name: playwright
playwright.installation_command: pip install playwright && playwright install chromium
playwright.description: Native Playwright with comprehensive manual stealth techniques

patchright.name: patchright
patchright.installation_command: pip install patchright && patchright install chromium
patchright.description: Patched Playwright fork with built-in stealth capabilities

camoufox.name: camoufox
camoufox.description: Firefox-based stealth browser with Playwright API and GeoIP spoofing

rebrowser_playwright.name: rebrowser_playwright
rebrowser_playwright.installation_command: pip install rebrowser-playwright && rebrowser-playwright install chromium
rebrowser_playwright.description: Commercial-grade Playwright fork with advanced anti-detection patches
